subGames.name: Quiplash 2
subGames.description: The say-anything sequel. Play all new questions or make your own!

subGames.name: Trivia Murder Party
subGames.description: A deadly quiz show where you match wits with a trivia-obsessed killer.

subGames.name: Guesspionage
subGames.description: The brain-battering data-mining guessing game.

subGames.name: Tee K.O.
subGames.description: The t-shirt slugfest where you battle your custom t-shirts to the death!

subGames.name: Fakin' It
subGames.description: One of your friends has something to hide in this sneaky game for tricksters.

subGames.name: Fibbage 3
subGames.description: The blanking fun sequel with all-new question types and the game mode Fibbage: Enough About You where you guess the weird facts about your friends.

subGames.name: Survive The Internet
subGames.description: The web-based frame game where you twist your friends’ “online” comments in hilarious ways.

subGames.name: Monster Seeking Monster
subGames.description: The spooky date-a-thon where you message and date fellow monsters with special powers.

subGames.name: Bracketeering
subGames.description: The deranged debate match where you place smart bets on stupid arguments.

subGames.name: Civic Doodle
subGames.description: The one-up art game where you compete to improve the town murals.

subGames.name: You Don't Know Jack: Full Stream
subGames.description: The pop-culture trivia mash-up YOU DON’T KNOW JACK: Full Stream. The classic returns, full of wild new surprises.

subGames.name: Split The Room
subGames.description: The what-if game Split the Room. Create strange and divisive hypothetical situations.

subGames.name: Mad Verse City
subGames.description: The lyric-writing game Mad Verse City. Channel your inner MC as a rap battling robot.

subGames.name: Patently Stupid
subGames.description: The competitive drawing game Patently Stupid. Create odd inventions to solve bizarre problems.

subGames.name: Zeeple Dome
subGames.description: The deadliest game show in the Crab Nebula, Zeeple Dome! Fling yourself at bloodthirsty aliens to win millions of Zubabucks!

subGames.name: Trivia Murder Party 2
subGames.description: The popular trivia deathmatch Trivia Murder Party 2. Try to survive the bizarre new minigames.

subGames.name: Role Models
subGames.description: The offbeat personality test Role Models. Find out who you really are. (Or at least what your friends think of you.)

subGames.name: Joke Boat
subGames.description: The comedy contest Joke Boat. Craft one-liners for a cruise ship talent show.

subGames.name: Dictionarium
subGames.description: The weird word circus Dictionarium. May the funniest definition win.

subGames.name: Push The Button
subGames.description: The hidden identity game Push The Button. Can you discover the aliens in time?

subGames.name: Quiplash 3
subGames.description: It’s a head-to-head battle of the wits as you give hilarious responses to quirky prompts while everyone else votes for their favorite!

subGames.name: The Devils and the Details
subGames.description: You’re a family of devils working together to survive in suburbia. Can you handle the daily torture of human life?

subGames.name: Champ'd Up
subGames.description: Create absurd characters that will battle over unusual titles. Can you take down the heavy favorite?

subGames.name: Talking Points
subGames.description: Speakers are given picture slides they’ve never seen before and words to read out loud that they didn’t write.

subGames.name: Blather 'Round
subGames.description: Describe your secret prompt with a very limited vocabulary and hope that someone can figure it out in time. It’s a “GOOD” “FUN TIME” “EXPERIENCE.”

subGames.name: Drawful Animate
subGames.description: It’s alive! The classic guessing game makes an energetic return in Drawful: Animate, which has players drawing two-frame animations based on absurd prompts.

subGames.name: Job Job
subGames.description: Use other people’s words to answer interview questions! Funny and unique answers get votes, and the player with the most points SCORES THE JOB (JOB)!

subGames.name: The Poll Mine
subGames.description: A survey game of survival! Divide into two teams, secretly answer survey questions, then try to guess the results. Can you open the correct doors and escape?!

subGames.name: Weapons Drawn
subGames.description: A social deduction game where everyone did it. You try to distract from the murders you committed by solving the other murders.

subGames.name: The Wheel of Enormous Proportions
subGames.description: A hybrid game of trivia and chance hosted by an immortal, all-knowing wheel from a mountaintop in the sky.

subGames.name: Roomerang
subGames.description: Channel your inner reality TV star in an attempt to come out on top! Respond to prompts, bring the competition and role-play to avoid being voted out.

subGames.name: Junktopia
subGames.description: A strange wizard has turned you into a frog! Create hilarious backstories for weird objects and then get them appraised. The player with the most valuable items becomes human again!

subGames.name: Nonsensory
subGames.description: Professor Nanners is here to test your NSP (Nonsensory Perception) in this drawing, writing, and guessing game! How close can you guess where another player's prompt ranks on the silliest of scales?

subGames.name: Fibbage 4
subGames.description: The hilarious bluffing party game returns with an all new Final Fibbage, video questions, fan-submitted questions, and Fibbage Enough About You mode!

subGames.name: Quixort
subGames.description: In this trivia sorting factory, work with your team to sort falling answers into their proper order before they hit the floor! It's as easy as A, C, B!

subGames.name: Tee K.O. 2
subGames.description: Return to T-Shirt Island, where the most hardened warriors in the world compete in a deadly fighting tournament. The drawing finger - not the fist - decides the victory!

subGames.name: FixyText
subGames.description: In this chaotic game, everyone's in group chat, typing all at once to make the most memorable statement. And there's no delete key.

subGames.name: Hypnotorious
subGames.description: Secret roles, tentative alliances and of course, silly answers to ridiculous questions. Who is on your side?

subGames.name: TimeJinx
subGames.description: You're a time traveler from the future competing in a high-stakes trivia night. Save your current timeline by answering questions about the past.

subGames.name: Dodo Re Mi
subGames.description: Your phone is your instrument. You and your flock must make music together to escape the hungry jungle plant.

subGames.name: Doominate
subGames.description: Take a perfectly lovely situation and destroy it in this head-to-head joke game where it feels so good to be so bad.

subGames.name: Hear Say
subGames.description: Record sound effects and dialogue directly from your phone in a foley-inspired game where laughter is the soundtrack. Then, watch your voices come to life in a series of short movie clips!

subGames.name: Cookie Haus
subGames.description: Play our coziest and kookiest drawing game yet by fulfilling cookie design orders for unusual clientele. Don’t play on an empty stomach!

subGames.name: Suspectives
subGames.description: There’s been a crime, one player secretly did it, and the evidence comes from your own survey answers! Study the clues, defend your innocence (even if you’re lying), and put your friends on trial.

subGames.name: Legends of Trivia
subGames.description: Assemble your team and put your trivia knowledge to the test in a fantastical world full of danger! Teamwork! Monsters! Do you dare take on one of the most challenging trivia games yet?
